thread.title: BRIEF-Abeona Therapeutics Appoints Carsten Thiel, Ph.D., As Chief Executive Officer

title: BRIEF-Abeona Therapeutics Appoints Carsten Thiel, Ph.D., As Chief Executive Officer
text:
April 2, 2018 / 12:49 PM / a few seconds ago BRIEF-Abeona Therapeutics Appoints Carsten Thiel, Ph.D., As Chief Executive Officer Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Abeona Therapeutics Inc : 
* ABEONA THERAPEUTICS APPOINTS CARSTEN THIEL, PH.D., AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER 
* TIM MILLER CONTINUES AS PRESIDENT AND ASSUMES CHIEF SCIENTIFIC OFFICER ROLE 
* THIEL MOST RECENTLY SERVED AS EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND CHIEF COMMERCIAL OFFICER OF ALEXION PHARMACEUTICALS, INC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
